QuestData.Title: Mud Hunter
QuestData.Description: Hope you're not afraid of getting dirty. Judging by the looks of you, that won't be a problem.$b$bTo the north, at the lava's edge, you'll find piles of dark mud. I need it.$b$bIt'd be best if you didn't ask questions, and focused your efforts on following orders, $n.
QuestData.CompletionText: You'll want to watch out for those obsidian elementals. They have a tendency to sneak up on you.
QuestData.RewardText: This is exactly what we need.$b$bDon't worry, $n... the killing will come soon enough.
